result.markdown:
---
title: "Toboggan Trajectory"
format: html
date: "2020-12-03"
---

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(stringr)
df <- read.csv("input2.csv")
```
:::



## Part 1



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
x <- 1
pounds <- ""
xVals <- c()

for(y in 1:323) {
  pounds <- paste(pounds, as.character(df[y, x]), sep = "")
  if(x + 3 > 31)
    x <- x + 3 - 31
  else
    x <- x + 3
  xVals <- append(xVals, as.character(x))
}

str_count(pounds, "#")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 228
```


:::
:::



## Part 2



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
over <- c(1, 3, 5, 7, 1)
down <- c(1, 1, 1, 1, 2)
running_total <- 1

for(z in 1:5) {
  x <- 1
  pounds <- ""

  for(y in seq(1, 323, by = down[z])) {
    pounds <- paste(pounds, as.character(df[y, x]), sep = "")
    if(x + over[z] > 31)
      x <- x + over[z] - 31
    else
      x <- x + over[z]
  }
  running_total <- running_total * str_count(pounds, "#")
}
running_total
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 6818112000
```


:::
:::
